data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 8,750 believers in Port of Spain, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Port of Spain do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, move the 8,750 believers in the state of Port of Spain to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 16,047 people in the state of Port of Spain who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 8,750 believers in Port of Spain and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.focus_label: Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago
data.section_summary:
the state of Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago has a population of 37,100.

We estimate Port of Spain has 8,750 people who might know Jesus, 16,047 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 12,303 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Port of Spain
location.full_name: Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago
